definitions.definition: a piece of text, a formal suggestion, or a drawing in its original state, often containing the main ideas and intentions but not the developed form:
examples: This is only a rough draft - the finished article will have pictures too.

definitions.definition: (of drinks such as beer) stored in and served from large containers, especially barrels:
to write down a document for the first time, including the main points but not all the details:
examples: Draft a proposal for the project and we can discuss it at the meeting.

definitions.definition: to draw the plans for a new building, structure, machine, etc.:
examples: They hired an architect to draft the plans for their new home.

definitions.definition: A draft plan, document, etc. is in its first form, including the main points but not all the details:
